actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for social security taxes imposed on wages paid for dependent care services in the home.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a deduction for the social security taxes imposed on wages paid for dependent care services. Allows such deduction in computing adjusted gross income.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for social security taxes imposed on wages paid for dependent care services in the home.
